teststorydesc: The EHR vendor loads MMRV immunization history data  for Juana Mariana Gonzales.
comments: The first dose is administered too early and will be invalid for the dose series
preCondition: The EMR has recorded all of the pediatric demographic in the record created for Juana Mariana Gonzales.
postCondition: The immunization history for MMRV known to the local practice is loaded into the record created for Juana Mariana Gonzales.
testObjectives: Record Past Immunizations: The EHR or other clinical software system allows providers to enter information about immunizations given elsewhere (e.g., by another doctor, at a public health clinic, pharmacy, etc.) with incomplete details.
evaluationCriteria:
